description: A forum complex at Rome begun under Domitian but completed under Nerva and dedicated in A.D. 97. Sometimes referred to as the Forum Transitorium, the complex was the next to last of the imperial fora at Rome.
details: In the Regionary Catalogues, the Forum of Nerva is included in both Regio IV as Forum Transitorium and in Regio VIII as Forum Nervae.

names.description: The Forum of Nerva earned this alternate name as it served as a main thoroughfare between the Subura and Forum Romanum.
